workflow.title: Automatical Disabling / Enabling of Operators or Subprocesses
workflow.description: This meta process shows another possibility for automatically optimizing the process layout. The operator "OperatorEnabler" can be used to enable or disable one of its children. Together with one of the parameter optimization operators this can be used to check which operators should be used for optimal results. This is especially useful in order to determine which preprocessing operators should be used for a particular data set - learner combination or if you want to automatically test different modeling schemes and automatically select the best one.
